title: Fragments, "Les Chinois", ca. 1810
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
dimensions:
a. Warp: 17.5cm (6 3/4in.). Weft: (seamed0 67cm (26 1/4in.).
b. Warp: 18.5cm (7 1/4in). Weft: 99cm (39in.). (cut edges).
description: Fragments showing part of the harbor at Yangchow and other scenes. 'A' comes from the start of the and images of the lashing lines which attached this cloth to the header are visible. In purple/brown on white.
